wikitext.*:
'''1 Yule''' was the last day in the [[Shire Calendar]], after [[30 December]], marking the end of the year.<ref>{{App|Shire}}</ref><ref group=note>On the Gregorian calendar, it would approximately correspond to [[21 December]].</ref> Due to the [[Shire-reform]] the Yuledays always fell on the same days of the week.  1 Yule was always a [[Highday]] (Friday).<ref>{{App|Calendars}}</ref>
